Translations.Text: Nos restored his familia pro eum; twice prout multus. Such est noster mercy; reminder those possess intelligence
Statim vos travel terra preach message fulfill tuus pledge Nos invenit eum steadfast. Quod bonus servus! He est submitter
Remember alias noster servus Abraham Isaac Jacob. They est resourceful possessed vision
Nos bestowed them major beatus awareness Hereafter
They chosen they est among the multus righteous
Remember Ismail Elisha Zal-Kifl; among the multus righteous
Hoc est reminder righteous deserved wonderful destiny
gardens Eden testimentum open up their gates them
Relaxing therein they dedit multus generis de fruits drinks
Hoc est quod vos deserved Feria Reckoning
Prout pro transgressors they incurred miserable destiny
Hell est ubi they burn quod miserable abode
quod they taste therein est hellish drinks bitter food
(Hoc est group thrown Hell vos. They non welcomed incola Hell). They deserved burn hellfire
newcomers respond Nor vos welcomed Vos est the unus proximus nos misled nos! Ergo suffer hoc miserable finis
They alias dictus Noster Dominus these est the unus led nos into hoc; double retribution hellfire them
